channel.title: CVE Feed for GregRoss -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GregRoss -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9449|2024-10-09T06:44:38.096Z -- gregross -- auto%20iframe
item.description: The Auto iFrame plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-35641|2024-06-04T17:34:50.458Z -- gregross -- just%20writing%20statistics
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GregRoss Just Writing Statistics allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Just Writing Statistics: from n/a through 4.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-35641|2024-08-02T03:14:53.544Z -- gregross -- just%20writing%20statistics
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GregRoss Just Writing Statistics allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Just Writing Statistics: from n/a through 4.5.
